label: AB3C6_hP20_173_b_a2b_2c-001
title: Edgarite (FeNb$_{3}$S$_{6}$) $P6_{3}$ \#173 Structure
comments:
The name Edgarite is also given to the FeNb$_{3}$S$_{6}$ structure in space group \href{current_web_home_dir/AB3C6_hP20_182_c_af_i-001}{$P6_{3}22$ \#182}, for which we use CoNb$_{3}$S$_{6}$ as the prototype. 
 (Bindi, 2018) attributes this discrepancy to the difference between natural and synthetic edgarite, although in the original discovery paper for the mineral (Barkov, 2000) say that ``The space group is most probably $P6_{3}22$.'' The ICSD lists many more structures in the $P6_{3}22$ structure than it does in the $P6_{3}$ structure.
